title: Analyze Delta-2 Codebase
description: Deep scan and analyze the codebase to understand its logic and functionality.

title: Create PRD Document
description: Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the delta-2 project that outlines the current functionality, architecture, and future plans.

title: Design Folder Structure
description: Create a streamlined folder structure for the delta-2 project that follows best practices and allows for easy debugging and extension.

title: Implement Orchestrator Module
description: Create an orchestrator module that will coordinate the execution of all components in the delta-2 project, including proper error handling, logging, and configuration management.

title: Create Configuration System
description: Implement a configuration system for the delta-2 project that allows for easy configuration of all components, including scrapers, processors, and analyzers.

title: Setup and Test Environment
description: Create a virtual environment, install requirements, and test run the delta-2 project.

title: Fix Google News Scraper Issues (Consolidated)
description: Consolidated task that addresses all Google News Scraper issues including data quality, article limits, and general functionality.

title: Fix Yahoo Finance Scraper Issues (Consolidated)
description: Consolidated task that addresses all Yahoo Finance Scraper issues including data quality and general functionality.

title: Fix Sentiment Analyzer Data Format Issues
description: Working on fixing sentiment analyzer data format issues to ensure proper handling of timestamps and other data fields.

title: Improve Directory and File Handling
description: Ensure all necessary directories are created before access, add initialization checks for data directories, implement better error handling for missing files, and add clear error messages to help diagnose issues.

title: Implement Comprehensive Error Handling
description: Add try-except blocks around critical operations, improve error messages with actionable information, add recovery mechanisms for common failures, and implement logging of full stack traces for debugging.

title: Refactor Code for Better Maintainability
description: Standardize error handling across modules, improve code organization and documentation, remove duplicate code and create shared utilities, and add comments to improve code readability.

title: Add Sample Data Generation for Testing
description: Implemented functionality to generate sample data for testing purposes.

title: Refactor Data Processing Pipeline
description: Improve the data processing pipeline by standardizing input/output formats and implementing better error handling.

title: Refactor Scraper Modules
description: Improve code organization and maintainability of scraper modules by applying consistent patterns and reducing code duplication.

title: Implement Unit Tests for Core Modules
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for core modules to ensure code quality and prevent regressions during refactoring.
